entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
